General.Name: Sabre Insurance Group PLC
General.Description: Sabre Insurance Group plc, through its subsidiaries, engages in the writing of general insurance for motor vehicles and motorcycles in the United Kingdom. It offers its products through a network of insurance brokers, as well as through its own direct brands, including Go Girl, Insure 2 Drive, and Drive Smart. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Dorking, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Sabre House, Dorking, United Kingdom, RH4 2YY

3.Name: Ms. Anneka  Kingan
3.Title: Chief Risk Officer, Company Sec. & Head of Internal Audit
